name: RetrieveOrderCustomAttributeDefinition
description:
Retrieve a custom attribute definition for an order.

This tool retrieves an order-related custom attribute definition from a Square seller account. It should be called when you need to access specific custom attribute information related to orders. Custom attributes must have visibility settings of VISIBILITY_READ_ONLY or VISIBILITY_READ_WRITE_VALUES unless defined by the seller.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute definition you want to retrieve. This should match the key set in Square seller account.

value_schema.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve.

parameters.name: current_custom_attribute_version
parameters.description: Specify the current version of the custom attribute for optimistic concurrency control.

value_schema.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

value_schema.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
